医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，COVID-19 疫苗避免了拉丁美洲和加勒比地区数百万人的死亡研究人员估计，从 2021 年初到 2022 年 5 月，COVID-19 疫苗在部分拉丁美洲和加勒比国家避免了 61 万至 262 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/COVID-19-vaccines-prevented-millions-of-deaths-across-Latin-America-and-the-Caribbean-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/COVID-19-vaccines-prevented-millions-of-deaths-across-Latin-America-and-the-Caribbean-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9de2c71-e28f-4ed9-aa8f-dc19ab325b7b Thu, 12 Sep 2024 21:02:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccines prevented millions of deaths across Latin America and the Caribbean, study shows
24 小时和 15 小时氧疗的健康结果没有差异每天 24 小时在家接受氧疗的肺病患者和低血氧患者组与接受相同治疗的组患者在生活质量、症状、入院率或死亡率方面没有差异根据瑞典隆德大学的一项研究，每天工作 15 个小时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/No-difference-in-health-outcomes- Between-24-hour-and-15-hour-oxygen-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/No-difference-in-health-outcomes- Between-24-hour-and-15-hour-oxygen-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df0ea96a-83e4-4a60-ae5f-1f081688a506 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:47:06 -0400 No difference in health outcomes between 24-hour and 15-hour oxygen therapy
大麻二酚在治疗认知障碍方面显示出前景研究回顾了大麻二酚（CBD）在治疗认知障碍方面的治疗潜力，强调了一些试验的积极作用，同时强调需要进行更全面的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Cannabidiol-shows-promise-in-treating-cognitive-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Cannabidiol-shows-promise-in-treating-cognitive-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb5f4ab8-2d96-40e3-ad3f-e32e5cf9dc6f Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:37:00 -0400 Cannabidiol shows promise in treating cognitive disorders
冰河时代青少年经历的青春期阶段与现代青少年相似具有里程碑意义的新研究表明，25,000 年前的冰河时代青少年经历了与现代青少年相似的青春期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Ice-Age-teens-experienced-puberty-stages-similar-to-modern-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Ice-Age-teens-experienced-puberty-stages-similar-to-modern-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53104e81-82eb-4783-8a1e-1007ae0349dd Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:36:46 -0400 Ice Age teens experienced puberty stages similar to modern adolescents
炎症性肠病治疗中当前和新兴的生物标志物炎症性肠病（IBD）包括克罗恩病（CD）和溃疡性结肠炎（UC），是一种胃肠道（GI）慢性炎症性疾病，严重影响患者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Current-and-emerging-biomarkers-in-the-management-of-lingual-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Current-and-emerging-biomarkers-in-the-management-of-lingual-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9cfc82-7891-49a3-9d9e-54ebb86100a1 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:21:09 -0400 Current and emerging biomarkers in the management of inflammatory bowel disease
新研究将较低营养分数的食物与心血管风险增加联系起来心血管疾病是西欧死亡的主要原因，占2019年死亡人数的1/3。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-study-links-lower-Nutri-score-foods-to-increased-cardioangio-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-study-links-lower-Nutri-score-foods-to-increased-cardioangio-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b9d964e-58aa-4deb-af1a-ac0fcc926d9a Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:06:50 -0400 New study links lower Nutri-score foods to increased cardiovascular risk
真实世界证据凸显了替西帕肽治疗 2 型糖尿病的安全性随着越来越多的 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 患者服用药物来帮助控制血糖水平和减轻体重，人们开始担心这些药物是否安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Real-world-evidence-highlights-safety-profile-of-tirzepatide-in-managing-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Real-world-evidence-highlights-safety-profile-of-tirzepatide-in-managing-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb5ad2e0-5e9b-4d6a-b9c4-f8d2093204da Thu, 12 Sep 2024 19:46:00 -0400 Real-world evidence highlights safety profile of tirzepatide in managing type 2 diabetes
早期 I 期数据显示 mRNA 癌症免疫疗法治疗晚期实体癌的前景mRNA 癌症免疫疗法 (mRNA-4359) I 期剂量递增部分的中期数据显示出对晚期实体癌患者的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Early-Phase-I-data-shows-promise-for-mRNA-cancer-immunotherapy-in-advanced-solid-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Early-Phase-I-data-shows-promise-for-mRNA-cancer-immunotherapy-in-advanced-solid-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb263236-8515-4d86-82ae-58d7098ac897 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 19:41:47 -0400 Early Phase I data shows promise for mRNA cancer immunotherapy in advanced solid cancers
对低血糖的恐惧限制了 1 型糖尿病成人的体力活动根据今年年度年会上公布的新研究，尽管大量使用连续血糖监测和胰岛素泵治疗，但对低血糖的恐惧仍然是 1 型糖尿病 (T1D) 成人体力活动和锻炼的重大障碍欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 会议，马德里（9 月 9 日至 13 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Fear-of-hypoglycemia-limits-physical-activity-in-adults-with-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Fear-of-hypoglycemia-limits-physical-activity-in-adults-with-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f504b232-3eb9-41d2-bf5b-3e05d5cad30c Thu, 12 Sep 2024 19:28:48 -0400 Fear of hypoglycemia limits physical activity in adults with type 1 diabetes
新工具 ehrapy 彻底改变了健康数据分析在亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的领导下，科学家们开发了一种易于使用的软件解决方案，专门用于分析复杂的医疗健康数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-tool-ehrapy-revolutionizes-health-data-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-tool-ehrapy-revolutionizes-health-data-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a2b3914-06c9-4793-bb54-6e545a96dcf1 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 15:34:26 -0400 New tool ehrapy revolutionizes health data analysis
